metadata.author: Finley Holt
metadata.description: Matrix documenting preservation status of axioms during KIF to OWL translation

safety_axioms.name: Collision Avoidance Axiom
safety_axioms.owl_workaround: CollisionRiskState class created for manual assertion
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express variable binding, numeric comparison (lessThan), or automatic inference of safety state

safety_axioms.name: Geofence Containment Axiom
safety_axioms.owl_workaround: GeofenceViolationState class created for manual assertion
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express multi-step property path with variable binding and automatic violation detection

safety_axioms.name: No-Fly Zone Axiom
safety_axioms.owl_workaround: NoFlyZoneViolationState class created for manual assertion
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express automatic inference from spatial relationship to safety violation

safety_axioms.name: Battery Reserve Axiom
safety_axioms.owl_workaround: LowBatteryState class and data properties for manual checking
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot perform numeric comparisons or bind numeric values in implications

safety_axioms.name: Altitude Violation Axiom
safety_axioms.owl_workaround: AltitudeViolationState class created for manual assertion
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express numeric comparison or automatic violation inference

safety_axioms.name: Lost Localization Safety Rule
safety_axioms.owl_workaround: LocalizationLostState class created for manual assertion
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express negation in antecedent or automatic action triggering

safety_axioms.name: Weather Safety Axiom
safety_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express numeric comparison or location-based constraint checking

operational_axioms.name: Multirotor Hover Capability
operational_axioms.reason: Converted to class subsumption; predicate-based assertion lost

operational_axioms.name: VTOL Capability Axiom
operational_axioms.reason: Split into separate subsumption axioms; disjunction in antecedent lost

operational_axioms.name: Valid Localization Inference
operational_axioms.owl_workaround: hasPositionQuality property preserved; automatic inference of localization validity lost
operational_axioms.reason: OWL cannot express disjunction in property values or automatic predicate inference

operational_axioms.name: FlybyF11 Default Properties
operational_axioms.owl_representation: Example instance FlybyF11Instance1 with data properties
operational_axioms.reason: Class-level defaults cannot be expressed; instance-level values used instead

structural_axioms.name: Class Hierarchies
structural_axioms.reason: Direct mapping to OWL class hierarchies

structural_axioms.name: Binary Predicates
structural_axioms.kif_axiom: All (instance X BinaryPredicate) with (domain X 1 Y) (domain X 2 Z)

structural_axioms.name: Ternary Predicates
structural_axioms.reason: OWL only supports binary properties; reification would add complexity

structural_axioms.name: Flight Phase Transitions
structural_axioms.owl_representation: Object property assertions between FlightPhase individuals

structural_axioms.name: Emergency Response Mappings
structural_axioms.reason: Ground facts preserved as property assertions

structural_axioms.name: Mutual Exclusion (isWithin/isOutside)
structural_axioms.reason: Approximated with property disjointness; full logical semantics lost

lost_capabilities.description: The ability to automatically infer safety violations from sensor data and state
lost_capabilities.mitigation: Use Vampire theorem prover with KIF ontology for safety reasoning

lost_capabilities.description: Comparisons like lessThan, greaterThan on numeric values
lost_capabilities.mitigation: Implement in application logic or use SWRL with numeric built-ins
Not expressible in OWL; requires FOL reasoner

lost_capabilities.description: Inferring conclusions from absence of facts
lost_capabilities.mitigation: Use closed-world assumption in application logic
Could use QUDT ontology for units; currently using plain decimals

elk_compatibility.recommendation: Ontology should work for ELK classification but safety axioms cannot be expressed in any OWL profile
